san-lo-bi-vb-pc100:3: bhagavān śrāvastīyam viharati | tā dāni śākiya-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo kolīya-kanyāyo gṛhi- caritāyo pravrajitāyo paṭu kāyo uccakṣukāyo kṣipra-niśāntikāyo | mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantaṁ pṛcchati | labhyā dāni bhagavan ūna-viṁśati-varṣāṁ gṛhi-caritām upasthāpayituṁ | bhagavān āha | labhyā | tāyo aṣṭa-varṣām nava-varṣāṁ gṛhi-caritām upasthāpayanti | tā a-prati-saṁkhyāna-vartinyo bhavanti | yathā ūna-viṁśati-varṣāḥ | yāvad bhagavān āha | na kṣamati ūna-dvādaśa-varṣāṁ gṛhi-caritām upasthāpayituṁ | atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṁ gautamīm āmantrayati | sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc100:5: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūna-dvādaśa-varṣāṁ gṛhi-caritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṁ |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc100:11: yā eṣā gṛhi-caritā ākāṁkṣati tathāgata-pravedite dharma-vinaye upasaṁpadaṁ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṁ sā tāya anugrāhitavyā | peyālaṁ | yāvat hasta-pādā nivāsayitavyāḥ | tena bhagavān āha |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc100:13: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūna-dvādaśa-varṣāṁ gṛhi-caritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṁ || 10 ||
